EventsDetail.Name: Pond Skimming
EventsDetail.Title: Pond Skimming
EventsDetail.BodyCopy:
Pond Skimming- Who would have thought that you could come to Rexburg, Idaho and have the chance to ski/board down a hill and attempt to cross a cold pond of water... and be excited about it? Another great reason to attend BYU-Idaho. Spots are limited for this event and many people love to participate as a skier/snowboarder/airboarder and many others love to come and cheer on their friends. We have a new location for Pond Skimming this year which is exciting! Many departments spend numerous hours making this a success, so get your tickets now. If Pond Skimming is not on your bucket list, well... it should be.


Date: February 21st, 2014
Time: 7:00pm- 8:00pm
Cost: $10.00 to skim &  $15.00 to skim & a T-shirt
Location: By Upper Fields/Ropes Course
We hope to see you on the next trip with the Outdoor Activities Department. Please remember that only students or spouse of students can participate.

Please meet at the Outdoor Resource Center with your I-card at least 15 minutes before departure time.

Purchase your ticket at the ticket office in the Kimball or online at http://www.byui.edu/tickets/
Pond Skimming 2013 Video:


 
You will be responsible for providing your own gear.
 

- Costumes are welcomed and strongly encouraged, must be appropriate
- Only skis, snowboard or airboards are allowed
- Huge tents for changing rooms will be provided
- Bring a extra change in clothes
- Your equipment is your responsibility. It is recommended to have a friend watch your gear while you change.
